home_hero_subtitle: CropWatch delivers an easy and accessible way to deploy robust IoT devices in Cold Storage and Farming environments where other sensors struggle or fail completely.
home_solutions_subtitle: Discover how we make a difference in various industries.
home_solutions_farming_description: Easily deploy and monitor your crops, livestock, and facilities, even in challenging rural environments where other sensors falter. Get reliable data from anywhere, at any time.
home_solutions_cold_storage_description: Manage your refrigeration and storage with real-time monitoring and alerts. CropWatch excels in cold, high-density environments where traditional sensors often fail.
home_solutions_heat_safety_description: Protect your team from heat stroke and dangerous conditions. CropWatch's Black Globe device delivers early warnings and reliable heat index monitoring for factories, warehouses, and outdoor worksites.
